ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 78
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe the metal disk is part of a quest to make a beacon. Message: 4 Date: Thu, 09 Sep 1999 09:29:01 -0400 From: Paul McClung
ygData.messageBody:
I believe the metal disk is part of a quest to make a
beacon.

Message: 4
Date: Thu, 09 Sep 1999 09:29:01 -0400
From: Paul McClung <p.e.mcclung@...>
Subject: Animated bait, third book, gearheart, emporium and
Solusek


The gnome in the emporium is part of a known quest that
starts in qeynos I
think, and involved making a part for a ship. HOWEVER! The
gnome sells a
component called a metal disk. Why? This sounds like a
tinkering item but
why would this islolated gnome sell this? Is it a hint of
some sort? I
questioned the gnome at length and could get no information
from him.
